translation.en: Li Jinbao.
Mongols.
They have already destroyed the temple at North Peak.
translation.es: Ya destruyeron el templo del Pico Norte.

translation.en: -Where are the nuns? -In the cloisters. East.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde están las monjas? - En los claustros. Al Este.

translation.en: Remember the oath. We fight to the end.
translation.es: Recuerda el juramento. Luchamos hasta la muerte.

translation.en: [Hundred Eyes] Life and death are one thread.
translation.es: La vida y la muerte son un mismo hilo.

translation.en: I will guard the scrolls.
[woman] Li Jinbao!
Do not kill him.
The Khan will want this one.
What kind of monk is able to kill, by himself, 25 Mongol soldiers?
translation.es: ¿Qué clase de monje es capaz de matar, él solo, a 25 soldados mongoles?

translation.en: Is it a form of dark magic practiced at your temple?
translation.es: ¿Es un arte oscuro que practican en tu templo?

translation.en: You shall never know, shall you?
What did you just say, monk?
You destroyed a temple
and all of the ancient scrolls that contained the answers you seek.
translation.es: con los pergaminos ancestrales que contenían las respuestas que busca.

translation.en: You monks were offering shelter to my enemies in South China.
translation.es: Ustedes, los monjes, ofrecían refugio a mis enemigos del sur de China.

translation.en: No place defies the Khan.
I will ask you again.
If you hold your tongue, I will take your tongue.
translation.es: Si no sueltas la lengua, te la arrancaré.

translation.en: What is this fighting art kept secret in a mountain temple?
translation.es: ¿Qué arte marcial es este que se oculta en un templo montañés?

translation.en: -The art of peace. -[Kublai chuckles]
You break the necks of trained soldiers,
cut their throats, gut them like wild pigs,
translation.es: los degüellas, los destripas como cerdos salvajes

translation.en: and you call it peace?
You destroy a temple and call it destiny?
translation.es: Usted destruye un templo y lo llama destino.

translation.en: Kings of the past would not have shown you grace.
translation.es: Los reyes del pasado no te habrían tenido piedad.

translation.en: Me, when I make war on a city,
I allow the craftsmen to live.
I conscript them into service... and they live.
translation.es: Los tomo a mi servicio, y ellos viven.

translation.en: Here.
You will reveal these Chinese secrets to my war ministers.
translation.es: Revelarás esos secretos chinos a mis ministros de guerra.

translation.en: Reveal Chinese secrets... to fight the Chinese.
translation.es: Revelar secretos chinos para usarlos contra China.

translation.en: Prove yourself useful, you can live.
translation.es: Si demuestras ser útil, puedes vivir.

translation.en: Defy my laws...
you'll die a death far worse than that suffered by the monks
translation.es: tu muerte será mucho peor que la que sufrieron los monjes

translation.en: who perished with your scrolls.
Oh, you find humor in my decree?
There is only one Supreme Executioner.
And those who try to take his place
translation.es: Y quienes intentan ocupar su lugar

translation.en: are like children trying to carve wood as a master carpenter.
translation.es: son como niños que intentan tallar madera como un maestro carpintero.

translation.en: Most will injure their own hands.
translation.es: La mayoría se lastima las manos.

translation.en: You do not fear death?
I do not cling to life.
translation.es: No me aferro a la vida.

translation.en: There is a difference.
Remove him.
This wrestler is named Black Steppe Boar.
translation.es: Este luchador se llama Jabalí Negro Estepario.

translation.en: A prisoner captured in Scythia.
translation.es: Es un prisionero capturado en Cythia.

translation.en: Do you know why he is named after the boar?
translation.es: ¿Sabes por qué lleva el nombre de jabalí?

translation.en: His resemblance is extraordinary.
He is called Boar because he has killed such without a weapon many times.
translation.es: Se llama Jabalí porque, muchas veces, mató a dichos animales sin armas.

translation.en: Boar will advance. He will seize you.
You will demonstrate how to break the grasp.
translation.es: Tú demostrarás cómo liberarte de su dominio.

translation.en: You cover my eyes?
Is that just?
The Great Khan wants a report on how you fight blindfolded.
translation.es: El Gran Kan quiere un informe de cómo luchas con los ojos vendados.

translation.en: He is a most capricious fool.
And if you were not cowards, you would tell him the same.
translation.es: Y si ustedes no fueran cobardes, le dirían lo mismo.

translation.en: [yelling] Quiet, monk!
The general you killed was the son of Subutai.
translation.es: El general que mataste era hijo de Subutai.

translation.en: Do you know that name, monk?
I do not.
[Kublai] Greatest military commander ever to serve Genghis Khan.
translation.es: El mejor comandante militar que haya servido a Gengis Kan.

translation.en: You slayed his son.
This is a crime beyond crimes.
Yet...
you do not cling to life, as you say.
translation.es: ...tú no te aferras a la vida, según dices.

translation.en: Death means nothing.
What is a Khan to do?
A merchant once gifted me a white crane from Lesser Armenia...
translation.es: Cierta vez, un mercader me regaló una grulla blanca de Armenia Menor...

translation.en: a water bird that was most uncommon...
because it had been born all black.
Black white crane.
I knew it was an auspicious being that would bring me fortune, but...
translation.es: Sabía que era un ser de buen agüero que me traería fortuna...

translation.en: that black white crane refused to stay on my lake.
translation.es: ...pero esa grulla blanca negra se negaba a quedarse en mi lago.

translation.en: Always, it would fly away.
Just its natural calling, you see.
So...
I served him and my fortune...
translation.es: ...la ayudé a ella y a mi fortuna...

translation.en: by cutting one wing.
[justice minister reading] "By law of the Grand Khan, Lord of Lords..."
translation.es: Por orden del Gran Kan, Señor de los Señores...

translation.en: [Kublai] Why do you think I had you fight blindfolded?
translation.es: ¿Por qué crees que te hice luchar con los ojos vendados?

translation.en: Because I'm a capricious fool?
Or to see if you are capable
of your Taoist secrets and skills while in the dark?
translation.es: de usar tus secretos y talentos taoístas en la oscuridad?

translation.en: "So be it."
[Kublai] Because I knew the moment you were presented,
you would not be like the obedient painter...
translation.es: que no serías como el pintor obediente,

translation.en: the resigned astrologer, the noble poet contented with wine.
translation.es: el astrólogo resignado o el noble poeta que se conforma con vino.

translation.en: You would refuse to serve the Mongol Empire.
translation.es: Te negarías a servir al imperio mongol.

translation.en: To this day...
that black white crane remains on my lake.
translation.es: esa grulla blanca negra permanece en mi lago.

translation.en: He is mine...
and he is beloved.
Are you now ready...
to teach my Ministers of Warfare?
translation.es: ...para instruir a mis ministros de guerra?

translation.en: Tea for the monk.
Do not confuse me with one of your holy Buddhists.
translation.es: No me confunda con uno de sus budistas santos.

translation.en: Wine.
You were punished for killing the son of Subutai.
translation.es: Se te castigó por matar al hijo de Subutai.

translation.en: Never forget that.
I shall not.
The monks of Wudang spend their lives trying to achieve true emptiness.
translation.es: Los monjes de Wudang pasan la vida intentando alcanzar la verdadera vacuidad.

translation.en: For only when the sage can overcome the self
translation.es: Solo cuando el sabio supera su individualidad,

translation.en: does he enter into the Tao.
That is a dark mystery beyond all mysteries,
translation.es: Es un misterio oscuro que supera todos los demás,

translation.en: and a gift you gave to me.
translation.es: y un don que usted me dio.

translation.en: Blind?
I now see the world with one hundred eyes.
translation.es: Ahora veo el mundo con cien ojos.

translation.en: Give him more wine.
I've just captured your horse.
I know.
Then know this.
There are four Taoist temples still standing in the Wudang Mountains.
translation.es: En las montañas Wudang, quedan en pie cuatro templos taoístas.

translation.en: My men will go there in a fortnight and burn them to the ground.
translation.es: Mis hombres irán allí en dos semanas y los reducirán a cenizas.

translation.en: At my single command,
your religion can be wiped off the face of this earth.
translation.es: tu religión puede desaparecer de la faz de la tierra.

translation.en: Or it can live...
grow...
thrive...
if you prove its value to me.
By training your ministers?
And someone else.
[Hundred Eyes] You must be the prince.
I am called Altai.
[Hundred Eyes] Why are you here?
[Altai] Lessons.
And what do you intend to teach me
in these... lessons?
I'm here to teach you that even the son of a royal khan
translation.es: Vengo a enseñarte que incluso el hijo de un kan real

translation.en: is capable of humility and learning.
translation.es: es capaz de ser humilde y aprender.

translation.en: Then take the broom, Altai, and sweep my floor.
translation.es: Entonces toma la escoba, Altai, y barre mi piso.

translation.en: Good answer. If only you believed it.
You are a little nomad weed in the garden of the world.
translation.es: Eres una pequeña hierba nómada en el jardín del mundo.

translation.en: They wish you to grow into a flowering tree.
translation.es: Ellos desean que te conviertas en un árbol floreciente.

translation.en: What is the most important part of such a tree?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es la parte más importante de dicho árbol?

translation.en: The many branches and the flowering.
translation.es: Sus numerosas ramas y las flores.

translation.en: I speak of legacy.
Ah! Thank you for untangling your elusive metaphor.
translation.es: Gracias por desenredar tu engañosa metáfora.

translation.en: We begin with roots.
[Altai] May I ask a question?
Do.
If you wish calligraphy on your wall,
translation.es: Si desea caligrafía en su pared,

translation.en: why not summon a painter who can see?
translation.es: ¿por qué no llama a un pintor vidente?

translation.en: Can you not read the character I made?
It is a symbol for fire.
Then what is wrong?
-It's upside down. -Precisely.
This is the kung fu character for patience, control.
translation.es: Este es el signo kung fu de la paciencia, el control.

translation.en: Remember this in the future, always,
translation.es: Recuerda esto en el futuro, siempre:

translation.en: "Never give way to anger."
translation.es: Nunca te dejes llevar por la ira.

translation.en: Sifu?
Have I not trained you into exhausted silence yet?
translation.es: ¿Aún no has aprendido a mantener silencio absoluto?

translation.en: Today's lesson is done, My Radiant Highness.
translation.es: La clase de hoy terminó, Mi Alteza Radiante.

translation.en: You cannot see it, I know. But...
I assure you it has been overseen by a great Chinese architect...
translation.es: Pero te aseguro que fue supervisado por un gran arquitecto chino,

translation.en: made from the most precious of woods and hides, and--
translation.es: hecho con las maderas y los cueros de mejor calidad y...

translation.en: Imbecile.
Someone has painted the character of fire upside down.
translation.es: Alguien pintó al revés el signo de fuego.

translation.en: I did.
On this day of the New Year...
translation.es: En este día de Año Nuevo,

translation.en: I ordain this place the Hall of the Fourth Treasure.
translation.es: decreto este sitio el Salón del Cuarto Tesoro.

translation.en: I name you Hundred Eyes...
translation.es: Te nombro a ti, Cien Ojos,

translation.en: -[chuckles] -...Minister of Martial Affairs.
And so...
I ask of you, as a Wudang priest,
translation.es: ...te pido que, como sacerdote de Wudang,

translation.en: give my son his Chinese name.
translation.es: le des a mi hijo su nombre chino.

translation.en: There have been 500 over time
translation.es: A lo largo del tiempo, 500 hombres

translation.en: who have held the name Emperor of All China,
translation.es: han ostentado el título de Emperador de Toda China,

translation.en: Son of Heaven.
Ordained by blood,
there are those who would have been better suited to harvest cow dung
translation.es: algunos hubieran servido mejor como recolectores de estiércol de vaca

translation.en: than to rule the greatest empire on earth.
translation.es: que como gobernantes del imperio más grandioso de la tierra.

translation.en: There are those who were as silver,
translation.es: Hubo algunos que fueron como la plata,

translation.en: a lesser metal, but worthy of coinage.
translation.es: un metal menor, pero digno de acuñar.

translation.en: And then there are those...
like cold stone,
who force their strength and fury
translation.es: que imponen su poder y su furia

translation.en: and win the title by fear and intimidation.
translation.es: y ganan el título a fuerza de temor e intimidación.

translation.en: Blood is nothing.
Heart and spirit make the sage.
translation.es: El corazón y el espíritu hacen al sabio.

translation.en: And by this...
I give this boy the name Jingim.
"True gold."
So be it.
He will walk out of here with this name,
translation.es: Él saldrá de aquí con ese nombre

translation.en: and carry it as his own into a tomorrow only the oracles can see.
translation.es: y lo llevará como propio hacia un mañana que solo los oráculos pueden ver.

translation.en: As for you, priest...
this temple is yours.
